segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, showing the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing left, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the water cascading over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a sheet down to the floor, widening quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the two-step stool is stretched high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool legs are splayed out, looking ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up, palm open expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, framing the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly by the sink contrast the watery disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's small panes reveal a calm garden path and fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back let in that bright daytime light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman adds a touch of homey charm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the unnoticed hazards make me uneasy overall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how routine hides such potential trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
